name: Enemy
greetingText: Belz | Iceburg | Doraemon | Hermione's | Red Panda | Shirin | .....
wishText: These names are memories that we've made over the years and they mean a lot to me, The jury, ghosties ðŸ‘» and I will always be by your side, just like you've been there for me. We have shared and grown a lot together there is still a lot ahead! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to my Enemy, !! ðŸŽ‰! I'm so grateful to have you in my life, and I hope we can continue making many more amazing memories together. Watching you grow and thrive is such an inspiration to me, and it always motivates me to push myself to be better, too. That's why I call you my enemy, because you challenge me in the best possible way. But honestly, you're more like voice of reason, always pushing me to be my best self. Here's to another year of Enemyship (probably not a real word), growth, and unforgettable moments. I had fun whether it's unraveling the mysteries of an iceberg , seeing mischievous joy of a childish demon, guided by wisdom and bravery of Hermione
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Grown a lot but still a lot more, Keep the fighting! Hope I can uplift the one who lifts us all.
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again.
